絚字的基本解释

絚
gēng
古同“緪”。

絚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gēng］
［《廣韻》古恒切，平登，見。］
亦作“絚1”。“縆1”的今字。
(1)粗绳索。
(2)紧；急。
[②]［gèn］
［《集韻》居鄧切，去隥，見。］
亦作“絚2”。通“亘2”。
接连；通贯。

絚字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絚； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页922第15
【廣韻】古恒切【集韻】居曾切【正韻】居登切，?音?。緪或省作絚。○按俗譌作絙。詳上絙註。　又古鄧切，音亙。【楚辭·九歌】緪瑟兮交鼓。【註】緪，急張絃也。一作絚。又【招魂】姱容修態，絚洞房些。【註】絚，竟也。一作緪。　又【後漢·班固傳】北彌明光而絚長樂。○按絚，《文選》作亙。善註：亙與絚古字通。

絚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絚字的起名意思

暂无。

絚
Basic explanation of words
絚
gēng
Gu Tong "緪".
絚
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gēng］
["Guang Yun" Gu Hengqie, Ping Deng, see you. ]
Also known as "絚1". The present character of "縆1".
(1) Thick rope.
(2) Tight; urgent.
[②]［gèn］
["Ji Yun" in Dengqie, go to Wei, see you. ]
Also known as "絚2". Same as "Gen 2".
Successive; through.
絚
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　絚; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 922 15
[Guang Yun] Gu Hengqie [Jiyun] Ju Zengqie [Zheng Yun] Ju Dengqie, "yin?".緪 or province for dumping. ○According to the customs, it is made as a 絙. Note on the upper 絙 for details.　 Gu Dengqi again, the sound is Gen. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] Quietly surging. [Note] It's anxious. One for 絚. Also [calling souls] 姱rong Xiuyi, shovel the bridal chamber. [Note] Yan is actually too. It's all over.　[Later Han·Ban Gu Chuan] Bei Mi Mingguang and 絚Changle. ○Press 絚, "The Selected Works" will be used as the eternal. Good note: Gen and 絚 ancient characters are connected.
